name: Pi-hole速 Updatelists
description: A black hole for Internet advertisements. This is a fork of the Pi-hole速 application that adds the ability to update the lists of blocked domains and regexes.
longDescription: The Pi-hole速 is a DNS sinkhole that protects your devices from unwanted content without installing any client-side software. This is a fork of the Pi-hole速 application that adds the ability to update the lists of blocked domains and regexes.
